title: SOLD 1911 T201 Mecca Double Fold Evers, Chance
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: SOLD 1911 T201 Mecca Double Fold Evers, Chance
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1911 T201 Mecca Double Fold Evers and Chance for sale.

$200.00 delivered. Paypal F/F, check or money order. SOLD

First commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe

Maybe the wrong place to ask this question, but here is one of the better looking t201 cards, IMO, and this is a gorgeous example, far better than my beater, and well worth the asking price. Best of luck with this sale!

Question - is that his glove, sticking out of Evers' pocket?

[quote name="jingram058" post=2263589]Maybe the wrong place to ask this question, but here is one of the better looking t201 cards, IMO, and this is a gorgeous example, far better than my beater, and well worth the asking price. Best of luck with this sale!

Question - is that his glove, sticking out of Evers' pocket?[/QUOTE]

Yes, sticking the glove in the back pocket when not on defense seems to have been fairly common then.
